title: Mouse click on link should select link
description: Mouse click on link should select link
OB: When the user clicks on any link in the welcome page, the appropriate action is executed, but the clicked link is not selected when the user returns to the welcome page.
EB: Links should be selected when clicked to provide more context to the user when they return to the welcome page.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the application build 20021001.
2. Ensure that you get a welcome page when you restart (remove the welcome line in prefstore.ini of the workbench metadata).
3. Click on any link in the welcome page.
4. Observe that the appropriate action is executed, but the clicked link is not selected when you return to the welcome page.
